a.title: CHS Senior Places 2nd at NYS Wrestling Championships

div.a: CHS Senior Places 2nd at NYS Wrestling Championships
div.div: Congrats to senior Mike Leibl for his 2nd place finish!
div.a: Read More about CHS Senior Places 2nd at NYS Wrestling Championships

a.title: RSES Students Enjoy New Exploration Space

div.a: RSES Students Enjoy New Exploration Space
div.div: RSES students are loving their new Exploration Space, a makerspace and STEAM lab that opened in the fall as part of an ongoing district initiative to increase hands-on learning opportunities for all students.
div.a: Read More about RSES Students Enjoy New Exploration Space

div.div: The Canastota Community is invited to visit the Albanese Complex from 6:00-8:00pm on March 19, 2020 to view student projects and learn about local businesses.
div.a: Read More about Community Celebration Set for March 19, 2020

em.style: color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Cambria; font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.2;

div.em: The Canastota Central School District aspires to be a District of Excellence that provides the best possible education to all students in a nurturing, engaging 21st century environment supported by a committed community.

div.div: 120 Roberts Street, Canastota, NY 13032 | Phone 315-697-2025 | Fax 315-697-6368
